patthana2.13:278.1_3: **Sahajātādhipati**—savitakkādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ vitakkassa ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.

patthana2.13:411.1_0: Upekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca upekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— upekkhāsahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā,
patthana2.13:411.1_3: upekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—upekkhāsahagate khandhe paṭicca upekkhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ;
patthana2.13:411.1_5: Upekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca upekkhāsahagato ca naupekkhāsahagato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:411.1_6: upekkhāsahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā upekkhā ca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ,
patthana2.13:412.1_0: Naupekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—naupekkhāsahagataṁ
patthana2.13:412.1_1: ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana2.13:412.1_4: paṭisandhikkhaṇe naupekkhāsahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana2.13:414.1_0: Upekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca upekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ upekkhāsahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā,
patthana2.13:414.1_3: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.13:414.1_4: Upekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetuke upekkhāsahagate
patthana2.13:414.1_7: Upekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca upekkhāsahagato ca naupekkhāsahagato ca dhammā uppajjanti nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ
patthana2.13:414.1_8: upekkhāsahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā upekkhā ca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ,
patthana2.13:415.1_0: Naupekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ naupekkhāsahagataṁ
patthana2.13:415.1_1: ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…

patthana2.13:416.1_3: vicikicchāsahagataṁ uddhaccasahagataṁ upekkhaṁ paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.13:417.1_0: Naupekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca upekkhāsahagato ca naupekkhāsahagato ca dhammā uppajjanti nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ
patthana2.13:417.1_1: upekkhaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ,

patthana2.13:417.1_9: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṁ paṭicca upekkhā ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā.

patthana2.13:418.1_1: upekkhāsahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhañca upekkhañca paṭicca dve khandhā,
patthana2.13:418.1_3: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe upekkhāsahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhañca upekkhañca paṭicca dve khandhā,
patthana2.13:418.1_5: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe upekkhāsahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca dve khandhā;
patthana2.13:418.1_7: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca upekkhañca paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.

patthana2.13:419.1_1: upekkhāsahagate khandhe ca upekkhañca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ,

patthana2.13:420.1_8: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe upekkhāsahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhañca upekkhañca paṭicca dve khandhā,

patthana2.13:458.1_4: nakāmāvacaraṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…

patthana2.13:463.1_7: nakāmāvacaraṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…

patthana2.13:492.1_0: Kāmāvacaro dhammo kāmāvacarassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—kāmāvacarā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ
patthana2.13:493.1_0: Nakāmāvacaro dhammo nakāmāvacarassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo— nakāmāvacarā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:493.1_2: Nakāmāvacaro dhammo kāmāvacarassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—nakāmāvacarā hetū cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:493.1_4: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Nakāmāvacarā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:494.1_0: Kāmāvacaro dhammo kāmāvacarassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—dānaṁ datvā sīlaṁ …pe…
patthana2.13:495.1_0: Kāmāvacaro dhammo nakāmāvacarassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati,
patthana2.13:496.1_0: Nakāmāvacaro dhammo nakāmāvacarassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo— nibbānaṁ maggassa,
patthana2.13:497.1_0: Nakāmāvacaro dhammo kāmāvacarassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṁ paccavekkhati assādeti abhinandati,
patthana2.13:498.1_0: Kāmāvacaro dhammo kāmāvacarassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati,
patthana2.13:498.1_5: pubbe suciṇṇāni garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati assādeti abhinandati,
patthana2.13:498.1_11: vatthuṁ kāmāvacare khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati,
patthana2.13:498.1_14: **Sahajātādhipati**—kāmāvacarādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:499.1_0: Nakāmāvacaro dhammo nakāmāvacarassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati,
patthana2.13:499.1_5: Nakāmāvacaro dhammo kāmāvacarassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati,
patthana2.13:499.1_7: **Ārammaṇādhipati**—jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati assādeti abhinandati,
patthana2.13:499.1_10: ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti,
patthana2.13:499.1_22: nakāmāvacare khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati taṁ garuṁ katvā rāgo uppajjati,
patthana2.13:499.1_25: nakāmāvacaro dhammo kāmāvacarassa ca nakāmāvacarassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:499.1_26: **Sahajātādhipati**—nakāmāvacarādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:500.1_0: Kāmāvacaro dhammo kāmāvacarassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā kāmāvacarā khandhā
patthana2.13:500.1_1: pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ kāmāvacarānaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:501.1_0: Kāmāvacaro dhammo nakāmāvacarassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo— kāmāvacaraṁ cuticittaṁ nakāmāvacarassa upapatticittassa …
patthana2.13:501.1_2: kāmāvacarā khandhā nakāmāvacarassa vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:501.1_3: paṭhamassa jhānassa parikammaṁ paṭhamassa jhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo …pe…

patthana2.13:502.1_1: pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ nakāmāvacarānaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo;

patthana2.13:502.1_8: nakāmāvacarā khandhā kāmāvacarassa vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo ….

patthana2.13:505.1_0: Kāmāvacaro dhammo nakāmāvacarassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— anantarūpanissayo,
patthana2.13:505.1_18: catutthassa maggassa parikammaṁ catutthassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.

patthana2.13:506.1_15: paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ dutiyassa jhānassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo …pe…

patthana2.13:513.1_0: Kāmāvacaro dhammo kāmāvacarassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ,

patthana2.13:514.1_4: **Pacchājātā**—nakāmāvacarā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:515.1_0: Kāmāvacaro dhammo kāmāvacarassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.13:515.1_3: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Kāmāvacaro dhammo nakāmāvacarassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.13:516.1_0: Nakāmāvacaro dhammo nakāmāvacarassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ.

patthana2.13:516.1_3: Nakāmāvacaro dhammo kāmāvacarassa ca nakāmāvacarassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:517.1_0: Kāmāvacaro ca nakāmāvacaro ca dhammā kāmāvacarassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.13:517.1_2: **Sahajātā**—nakāmāvacarā khandhā ca mahābhūtā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:517.1_4: **Pacchājātā**—nakāmāvacarā khandhā ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:517.1_5: **Pacchājātā**—nakāmāvacarā khandhā ca rūpajīvitindriyañca kaṭattārūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:517.1_6: Kāmāvacaro ca nakāmāvacaro ca dhammā nakāmāvacarassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.13:517.1_8: **Sahajāto**—nakāmāvacaro eko khandho ca vatthu ca tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…

patthana2.13:527.1_6: khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…

patthana2.13:529.1_0: Rūpāvacarañca narūpāvacarañca dhammaṁ paṭicca rūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—paṭisandhikkhaṇe
patthana2.13:529.1_1: rūpāvacaraṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…

patthana2.13:529.1_5: paṭisandhikkhaṇe rūpāvacare khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṁ.

patthana2.13:761.1_0: Saraṇo dhammo saraṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati,
patthana2.13:761.1_7: Saraṇo dhammo araṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:761.1_9: Saraṇo dhammo saraṇassa ca araṇassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:761.1_10: **Sahajātādhipati**—saraṇādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:762.1_0: Araṇo dhammo araṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati,
patthana2.13:762.1_4: uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati,
patthana2.13:762.1_7: ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti,
patthana2.13:762.1_13: **Sahajātādhipati**—araṇādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:762.1_14: Araṇo dhammo saraṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:762.1_17: uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati,
patthana2.13:762.1_23: araṇe khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati,
patthana2.13:763.1_0: Saraṇo dhammo saraṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā saraṇā khandhā pacchimānaṁ
patthana2.13:763.1_2: Saraṇo dhammo araṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—saraṇā khandhā vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:764.1_0: Araṇo dhammo araṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā araṇā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ
patthana2.13:764.1_4: Araṇo dhammo saraṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—āvajjanā saraṇānaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.

patthana2.13:771.1_0: Saraṇo dhammo saraṇassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—saraṇā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:771.1_4: **Nānākkhaṇikā**—saraṇā cetanā vipākānaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:771.1_5: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Saraṇā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:772.1_0: Araṇo dhammo araṇassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā,
patthana2.13:774.1_0: Saraṇo dhammo saraṇassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:774.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Saraṇo dhammo araṇassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.13:774.1_3: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Saraṇo dhammo saraṇassa ca araṇassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:775.1_0: Araṇo dhammo araṇassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.13:775.1_3: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Araṇo dhammo saraṇassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:776.1_0: Saraṇo ca araṇo ca dhammā saraṇassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.13:776.1_2: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Saraṇo ca araṇo ca dhammā araṇassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.13:776.1_4: **Sahajātā**—saraṇā khandhā ca mahābhūtā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:776.1_5: **Pacchājātā**—saraṇā khandhā ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:776.1_6: **Pacchājātā**—saraṇā khandhā ca rūpajīvitindriyañca kaṭattārūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
